req.description: Set to the value of the corresponding reqId of a ProtocolRequest

clt.description:
Set to clientId of a SyncRequest in case the given clientId was valid. Otherwise it is set to null.
Calling EnsureValidClientId() when clientId == null a new unique client id will be assigned.
For tasks which require a clientId a client need to set clientId to clientId.
This enables tasks like SubscribeMessage or SubscribeChanges identifying the EventMessage target.
